exa.name: Eric Monsef
exa.verification: Eric Monsef is a real person and a former senior engineering leader at Apple. Verification confirms he served as Senior Director of Core Hardware Engineering and Senior Director of Mobile Product Design at Apple between 1999 and 2014. While some sources colloquially refer to him as a 'senior technology pioneer' or 'CTO' in his current role at Atom Limbs, he never held the title of Chief Technology Officer (CTO) at Apple. Apple's historical CTOs include figures like Ellen Hancock and Bobby Yerzamian; Monsef was a high-level director/VP-equivalent in hardware.
